{{Quote|[[Eregion]]'s fate is decided.|Official Synopsis, [[Amazon Studios]]}}

'''Doomed to Die''' is the fifthteenth episode of [[Amazon Studios]]'s television series, ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Rings of Power]]''. It is the seventh episode of the second season and it was released on [[26 September|September 26]], [[2024]].
